original_text: Perhaps some believers from Macedonia might come with me. If you are not ready when we come, we would be ashamed. We would be ashamed because we trusted you. And I think that you would be ashamed as well!
korean_text: 혹 마게도냐인들이 나와 함께 가서 너희가 준비하지 아니한 것을 보면 너희는 고사하고 우리가 이 믿던 것에 부끄러움을 당할까 두려워하노라

sentences.original_text: Perhaps some believers from Macedonia might come with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 마케도니아에서 온 어떤 신자들이 나와 함께 올지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: If you are not ready when we come,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 올 때 당신이 준비되지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: We would be ashamed because we trusted you.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신을 신뢰했기 때문에 부끄러울 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: And I think that you would be ashamed as well!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신도 부끄러울 것이라고 나는 생각합니다!
